item.title: Need Help With Bank Please
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

You are dumb, justlikers.
It’s the code for the player’s name. So if his name was Janie (?) and you said ("Hello "+playerName, 6666);, in game it would say “Hello Janie.”

Don’t act smart.

item.title: Need Help With Bank Please
item.dc:creator: @freekattack freekattack
item.description:
@freekattack wrote:

public void openUpBank() {
sendQuest("+playerName+ 's @cya@Awesome @bla@B@red@a@bla@n@red@k", 5383);
	sendFrame248(5292, 5063);
	resetItems(5064);
	IsBanking = true;
}

Where it says:

+playerName+

It says that it’s not the way to put it
Im not sure how to fix it.
